thread.title: Michelle Andro
thread.title_full: Quality Logo Products, Inc. reviewed by Michelle Andro

author: Michelle Andro
title: Michelle Andro
text: I had a great experience working with Stacy at QLP. She was quick to respond accurately, made awesome recos and is extremely cheerful. A true pleasure. Additionally, we love our logo'd umbrellas and so do our customers. Best part was that we received them a week early! Kudos to Stacy and her team at QLP.
